expected.text: This weapon deals primarily Puncture and Impact damage.
Rockets have a minimum arming distance of 7 meters and explode in a 5 meter radius after impacting a surface or enemy.

children.text: Initial hit and explosion apply status separately.
Explosion does not need direct line of sight to deal damage and will penetrate walls.
Can benefit from Firestorm (Primed) and Cautious Shot.

expected.text: Rocket direct impacts have a guaranteed Impact proc.
Reloading while sprinting gives a +25% reload speed bonus (+50% when used by Gauss/Gauss Prime).
